website_summaries.verdict: The best budget option to buy when you simply need a little extra light in a room.
pros: Single bulb design with a simple light shade provides good coverage
cons: Not as durable as other floor lamps

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my lamp, I ordered direct from amazon, paid about $13. It arrived undamaged, all pieces were in box and I put it together in a few minutes. The lamp shade is a thick plastic and it stays on once you screw it down like the instructions suggest, it does the job and it looks good standing in my living room, I have no complaints. Its NOT a $30 lamp so stop expecting $30 quality. Its a very good value lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Very basic, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but there's not much too it. Very cheap plastic base and almost rubbery type plastic light cover. My kids constantly broke lamps so I purposely went cheap for That reason. The plastic base cracked AS I was putting it together, but it still works fine. Kids have knocked it down twice and it's still in 1 working piece. If you're looking for style, this is not it. If you're looking for a basic lamp that does it's job without wasting money, then this is it. I do think it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: brit1028

customer_reviews.title: Low price = Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I just saw they had this same lamp at Walmart for $7.98. SMH! Quality is VERY poor, but if I paid $7.98 I would not have expected much more.
customer_reviews.author: AKL_HBG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product but be carful assembling
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp! Only down side I saw was when assembling the product(which was easy and less than 5 mins) I noticed when screwing the parts together it is extremely easy to cross thread and ruin the screws. So be extra careful and if the pieces aren't screwing together in screw them and start over don't force it or you'll probably ruin them
customer_reviews.author: Derp

customer_reviews.title: Not gold
customer_reviews.text: This is not gold! Not metallic at all or even matte gold. More of a taupe or light brown. So deceiving because even the light on the box looks gold however the lamp does not match that at all. Definitely do not order if you are looking for gold accents for a room.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Green

customer_reviews.title: Best lamp ever
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS LAMP. Anyone considering it should just buy it now. Super easy to put together it took like 5 minutes. It looks sleek, I really like the black. I have a 3-way light bulb in it and it makes my room super bright or a nice mood setting dim (and another brightness level in between).
customer_reviews.author: Nova90

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It's a light and it gives light but it bearly holds itself up and is super flimsy. I paid like $11 for it plus like $6 for shipping. If I bought it local instead of online I would have taken it back. Plus the shade isn't brownish white how it looks in the pic. It is regular plastic white. Because they sent a black one instead of brown....
customer_reviews.author: Angela Newman

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT gold!
customer_reviews.text: This is a tan color and has no gold tone at all. Also the very flimsy plastic bowl was cracked. I would return but I brought it to the office to assemble and just didn’t have the time or energy to take it apart and deal with returns. I understand it’s inexpensive but this is BAD. I’ll be replacing soon. Not sure what to do with this poop/tan colored lamp now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you are looking for a simple lamp and ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you are looking for a simple lamp and nothing elegant. The plastic looks pretty cheap, naturally, but if you aren't using the lamp as a show piece or something it is fine. I have two in my bedroom and they look great and work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cristine

customer_reviews.title: Does not look gold like on the box.  False advertising....
customer_reviews.text: As you can see I do not like this product. It is supposed to be somewhat gold. The one I got looks brown. I highly do not recommend this if you are looking for a gold look. This lamp is definitely brown but it came in a gold Mainstays box.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Very upset
customer_reviews.text: Just awful! Has nothing to do with how cheap but poorly manufactured! Came completely defected! Screws wont go in and now tilts and the shade is cracked all inside. Waste of time and money. I should have gone to walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It provides light for my room. Which for some reason has not ceiling light.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Missing a crucial part
customer_reviews.text: Product came without the on/off switch that screws onto the stem in the lamp. Must unplug every time I want to use it. Ugh. Missed the return window so stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lawrance

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than cheap!
customer_reviews.text: cheaper than cheap! The light globe is flimsy plastic, the base is flimsy plastic. The lamp won't stand up straight because apparently there are some stripped threading inside one of the pole bars. I've bought similar cheap lamps before, expecting a cheap lamp that would do... but none were ever as crappy as this! Definitely returning!
customer_reviews.author: Krysten P

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and deff not gold more of a bronze color.. returned..
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Floor Lamps
customer_reviews.text: For the money ,it's worth it. The gray one I bought looks nice and unassuming in living room. I also have the black one.
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great light.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp came very quickly! I really like the height and overall look of this item. It is not that study of an item so if you live with children or pet, I recommend the lamp be set up in a corner or behind something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is OK for the price. Lamp shade is very cheap plastic. Lamp pole is very thin metal, and small in diameter. Lamp works fine for a sub $20 item.
customer_reviews.author: DaGoatRancher

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Honestly, the worst product I have ever had the displeasure of purchasing on Amazon. Rickety, parts do not fit well/tightly together and the threads in the pole were crooked so the lamp leans to one side. Junk. DO. NOT. BUY.
customer_reviews.author: aaron breuer

customer_reviews.title: Low cost lamp option
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality but we just needed a simple floor lamp for the nursery so we knew for the price it would be cheaply made. It only took a few minutes to put together and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Cook

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to reviews!!
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to reviews. Shade came broken. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: MartinaTC

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Don't get the bulb listed in the instructions. It burns out every couple of days. Other than that, it works great. It looks very nice in our son's room.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Vega

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for homes with children or dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Very thin shade is plastic with a caution sticker on!!!! Not suitable for homes with children or dogs
customer_reviews.author: altinstar

customer_reviews.title: Good but will eventually stop working
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this lamp for almost 2 years and now it’s starting to be glitchy. It was a great lamp for the value and served its purpose. I’m not sure if the circuit burned out, but the lamp will flicker or stop being lit. I replaced the bulb and moved to different outlets to test it, and it’s definitely the lamp itself.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, pretty satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The lamp itself works fine, no issues. When it arrived however and I took it out, the shade base was split open. It is not an issue for me, but it is very flimsy plastic (the shade and the shade base).
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good priced and works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp for the price. Made with a3 way bulb socket. Would have liked the pole to be a little heavier. But works fine
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: nice cheap lamp
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I got exactly what I expected. The lamp looks nice from a distance but is clearly very cheap and if you sneeze it would probably fall over, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good investment.
customer_reviews.text: I backed my scooter into the one I had. This was replacement. Works just to my needs. I've bought Mainstays a couple of times in the past. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: This floor lamp is a good buy for the price; however, the product description does not state that the pole is comprised of segments that must be screwed one into another. It is difficult to unscrew a segment if it does not go in straight.
customer_reviews.author: Pensandote

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious look for a lot less.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. It's super affordable and pre assembled. It has the appearance of a more expensive lamp like the wood and glass top ones. I got this to light up a corner in my room and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews only

customer_reviews.title: It lights up the room
customer_reviews.text: The same lamp one can get at most Targets or WalMarts for the same price - simple, neutral but very 'plastic-y' looking. The photo looks like it could pass for a tinted glass, but not so much in person.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Doe

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: just a cheap lamp, it works but the up charge is insane same lamp is $8 at target...
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: It's a lamp
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Easy to put together. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Degler

customer_reviews.title: Would be okay if not damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. The base has a chunk missing and top is cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp with 3 light levels good pricing Could have ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp with 3 light levels good pricing Could have a bigger switch handle for elderly but I simply put a rubber cap over the switch handle
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Research before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Check other sites. Comes from another site and is heavily uncharged.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Base is not stable.
customer_reviews.text: It gives off a lot of lumens , but the base is a little too small for a house with pets. I have a pet rabbit named "Ducky" and he is dabbling with the idea of trying to knock it over. Make sure you un-plug it before you leae the house or take it down for the night.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: I use this lamp in my office area, it gets plenty of light during the day, but the evenings can be rather dim. A 3-way switch is uncommon in my home, so I purchased some 3-way LED bulbs for it.
customer_reviews.author: Salman A. Al-farisi

customer_reviews.title: Lamp is made of cheap materials, nearly damaged it ...
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is made of cheap materials, nearly damaged it putting it together. I recognize the price is also cheap, but I have another lamp of similar quality that was half the price. It's a $10 lamp. Also was surprised that it arrived in a Walmart packing box. Wouldn't have ordered it if I knew it was coming from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Just a simple, cheap lamp that will do the job. Seems like the ON switch doesn't work until 5 spins sometimes. You get what you pay for. Great for college students on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingReviews

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. For the money
customer_reviews.text: ordered 3. on one of them the plastic top was cracked and am sending back. Easy assembly. For the money, a good product
customer_reviews.author: Alex T

customer_reviews.title: Bowl came broken, but still provides good lighting
customer_reviews.text: Same as previous customers, the bowl is very thin/flimsy/cheap and came broken. As far as the lamp goes, it provides good lighting for what it is intended to be used for. I am also upset that I paid $23.00 and now it's selling for $18.00 :( The only reason why I didn't return it was because we had guests over and desperately needed light in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very good lamp, super simple to put together. I wish the power cord was longer, but I have an extension cord so no big deal. I will most likely buy two more lamps because I was that happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: fatimah

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Prime driver decided to throw the box over my fence onto concrete instead of ringing the doorbell for some reason luckily no damage was done and the lamp looks good
customer_reviews.author: Turkey

customer_reviews.title: They are good for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are good for the price. They are a little flimsy when you move them, but other than that they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... well but the finish on it is less than perfect however as the price was excellent I can't actually
customer_reviews.text: works well but the finish on it is less than perfect however as the price was excellent I can't actually complain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The 3 levels are great and when it's at its brightest
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is nothing special, but it is a staple in my living room! The 3 levels are great and when it's at its brightest, it lights up the room.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlight

customer_reviews.title: light shade arrived cracked and an email to the company ...
customer_reviews.text: light shade arrived cracked and an email to the company went unanswered. we just turned it to the other side and it still looks ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jo M.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just a cheap lamp all together. Does it's job but seems to unscrew on it's own quite often.
customer_reviews.author: tammy toombs

customer_reviews.title: This product was delivered broken. I would have gladly ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered broken. I would have gladly returned it at the time if I didn't absolutely need it for my classroom. Just put clear packing tape on the lamp cover and that was it. Would have preferred it wasn't delivered broken, but you get what you paid for, and it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: S. F. Holden

customer_reviews.title: I finally saw the light ... but this wasn't the one.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. leaned to the side. tossed. Same lamp in stores for about a 3rd of the price.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp. Price was right, it looks as described. Fits well in the narrow space I have to fit it in. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: betty hanley

customer_reviews.title: Basic Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Basic Lamp, if you literally just need a basic lamp that works when you turn the switch then look no further
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this lamp at all. The lamp shade was made of plastic and it looked old and gross. The connecting poles for the post were rusty on the ends, WTF!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It woks
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and looks good. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Greer Peters

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It's a standard standing lamp. One of my shades came cracked but honestly I don't know if it was shipped that way or occurred when the box fell off the chair lol. Install is easy, and it's exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For such an inexpensive light, it doesn't look cheap. 3-way bulb puts off a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: First, I got it broke. Second, the color is not gold.
customer_reviews.author: Motaz and Arwa

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest for a reason.. but I can imagine worse
customer_reviews.text: Not the best at remaining level at various points of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisDb

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small living room
customer_reviews.text: with the correct bulb it lights up our tiny living room perfectly. Just be aware that the lamp part can easily topple off, so make sure it's in a sturdy and safe area.
customer_reviews.author: BookwormKitchen

customer_reviews.title: Floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: Works better than my expensive floor lamp and uses a three-way bulb for varying levels of light. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Patterson

customer_reviews.title: but looked like a reasonable lamp for price
customer_reviews.text: arrived broken, but looked like a reasonable lamp for price.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't assemble quite right, but it does give off light.
customer_reviews.author: J. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lamp & Best Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy lamp. I recommend this to everyone who needs a affordable moderen style lamp.
customer_reviews.author: A'sha Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: It works! flimsy shade & you have to assemble, but looks great & the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Not gold color
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even put it out of the box, it is not gold. More like a kaki color.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Cirilo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend for light use only plastic and on the cheaper quality side but looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the lamp, however for being a prime item I did not get in in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: Not Gold at all! Came cracked & Plastic base is weak! Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R.

customer_reviews.title: Not metallic as the picture, but decent
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a metallic gold so if you’re going for a luxury look, this won’t do it hence the price. Still a nice lamp and is fine for my 3 year olds room.
customer_reviews.author: Vita R

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp for the price, but wish it included a light bulb!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Looks base looks plastic, the pole is too thin ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks base looks plastic , the pole is too thin, the material looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together and for the price looks expensive
customer_reviews.author: Julie mikus

customer_reviews.title: Good looking. Nice action on the switch
customer_reviews.text: Good looking. Nice action on the switch. Good height. Doesn't rock or wiggle. Happy with the purchase - works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey T. Wetherell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my lamp it is so great for my living room
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and color, but came to us with a cracked light casing :(
customer_reviews.author: Angelina G.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Gives off a very home-y feel
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! Gives off a very home-y feel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not gold like advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not gold. It is more a natural tan color. Works fine but again is not gold!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lamp was super easy to put together and all of the pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Lamp was super easy to put together and all of the pieces were in the box. The top shade of the lamp is cracked and so is the stand itself, so I’m not please with that.
customer_reviews.author: SHERIDAN

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheaply made lamp, thin plastic shade, hence the price. works ok, but if you're looking for a really nice lamp, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Rossman

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Easy to assemble, and very nice looking for such an affordable price. I'm probably going to order two more for my new apartment which lacks overhead lights. (This one was for my office).
customer_reviews.author: zoobadger

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is great it's. it expensive but doesn't look cheap
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is great it's. it expensive but doesn't look cheap. It lights up our entire bedroom and took five minutes to put together
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Holman

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent lamp. Tall. Havent had any issues. My only dislike about it is how the white shade sits on top. It is loose and flimsy so 4 stars. Otherwise, does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Paola

customer_reviews.title: Broken part
customer_reviews.text: The top glass cover is broken. Sending the package back cost more money. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann Morales

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a very reasonable corner floor lamp! Very thin pole, but works good! Color is dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: PatO

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied I received a brown lamp not gold at all I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I used it for two months. And only the ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it for two months. And only the second switch can still work. Maybe it has something to do with the electricity system in my apartment??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will light up your life!
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive lamp. Three way bulbs work perfect. I have no idea why I lived in the dark so long!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Broken lamphead
customer_reviews.text: Good lamp, easy to assemble. But the head was cracked all the way to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Shahad

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made. Once you put it together you'll ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Once you put it together you'll have a hard time picking it up to move it because the base falls off.
customer_reviews.author: sfgiants

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect product, exactly as I expected it and super easy to build.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Papa

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not the gold shown in the picture more like bronze brown and the shade came cracked. So I had to purchase my own
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate color
customer_reviews.text: The color of the product did not match the picture. More tan/brown than gold
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: went to target and bought a better one
customer_reviews.text: Came broken... went to target and bought a better one
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is not gold. It’s tan. There’s no shine. It looks so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: It was broken when it arrived.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived broken. The shade is shattered pieces of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Tukey

customer_reviews.title: Defective design. Shade cannot be installed since socket ring cannot touch threads after being placed in shade.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp appears to have a flaw in its design. One is to unscrew the socket ring, place shade over threaded part of socket and then tighten socket ring. However, when the shade is placed over the socket ring, the socket ring is raised too high to connect with the threaded part. Therefore, the socket ring cannot be screwed in and the shade installed. I am returning the lamp as defective. The lamp appears to be manufactured without defects. The defect is in the design of the lamp, particularly the socket ring which is too short to connect to the socket threads after being inserted into the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Tinkerer

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice. You get what you pay for in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though this lamp is plastics and make fairly cheep. It looks nice. You get what you pay for in a lamp, but I wasn't worried about it being fancy. The 3 levels of light are fantastic. I have it in my living room to add extra light as needed since we have limited fixtures in our house. It sits in the corner and ads the extra light I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Momo23

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in a squished box with broken lamp shade.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp & great price
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was just as described & easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Molly K. Holstein
